name: Airflow DevContainer
postCreateCommand: pip install --upgrade pip && pip install -r requirements.txt || true
postStartCommand: set -e; SOCK_GID=$(stat -c '%g' /var/run/docker.sock); if ! getent group docker-host >/dev/null; then sudo groupadd -g ${SOCK_GID} docker-host || true; fi; sudo usermod -aG docker-host ${USER} || true
